  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

                     java.lang.String fragmentFile)
              throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        vertexFile - Vertex shader file
        fragmentFile - Fragment shader file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if shader file cannot be found, compiled, validated or linked

    • Method Detail

      • createUniform

        public void createUniform(java.lang.String uniformName)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the uniform in the current shader and attaches it to the relevant uniform location map. This caches the uniform, as glGetUniformLocation() is a slow method.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of uniform to get location of from GPU
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the uniform location is -1, which means the uniform does not exist of is compile out of the code. If it is compiled out of the code, it had no effect (direct or indirect) on the final outputs of the respective shader.

      • createUniformPointLights

        public void createUniformPointLights(java.lang.String uniformName)
        Gets the uniform in the current shader and attaches it to the relevant uniform location map. This caches the uniform, as glGetUniformLocation() is a slow method. This is used for an array of point lights. By default, it will create 4 in the shader.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of uniform to get location of from GPU

      • createUniformPointLight

        public void createUniformPointLight(java.lang.String uniformName,
                                    int arrayLocation)
        Gets the uniform in the current shader and attaches it to the relevant uniform location map. This caches the uniform, as glGetUniformLocation() is a slow method. This is used for a single point light in an array.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of uniform to get location of from GPU
        arrayLocation - Location in array of point lights

      • createUniformPointLight

        public void createUniformPointLight(java.lang.String uniformName)
        Gets the uniform in the current shader and attaches it to the relevant uniform location map. This caches the uniform, as glGetUniformLocation() is a slow method. This is used for a single point light.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of uniform to get location of from GPU

      • createUniformDirectionalLight

        public void createUniformDirectionalLight(java.lang.String uniformName)
        Gets the uniform in the current shader and attaches it to the relevant uniform location map. This caches the uniform, as glGetUniformLocation() is a slow method. This is used for a single directional light.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of uniform to get location of from GPU

      • createUniformSpotLights

        public void createUniformSpotLights(java.lang.String uniformName)
        Gets the uniform in the current shader and attaches it to the relevant uniform location map. This caches the uniform, as glGetUniformLocation() is a slow method. This is used for an array of spot lights.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of uniform to get location of from GPU

      • createUniformSpotLight

        public void createUniformSpotLight(java.lang.String uniformName,
                                   int arrayLocation)
        Gets the uniform in the current shader and attaches it to the relevant uniform location map. This caches the uniform, as glGetUniformLocation() is a slow method. This is used for a single spot light in an array.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of uniform to get location of from GPU
        arrayLocation - Location in array of spot lights

        Parameters:

      • getLocation

        public int getLocation(java.lang.String name)
                throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Gets the location of a cached uniform
        Parameters:
        name - Name of variable to search for
        Returns:
        Location of uniform variable in current shader
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if uniform variable cannot be found in cache or shader
